channel.title: Area Actions Deletes Power Cores
channel.description:
I just discovered a major bug with the Area Actions mod that required me to revert back a huge amount of changes. if you use the "clear inventories" action in machines with power cores it will destroy the power cores along with the machines inventory.
I don't know if its be reported yet but that is a major flaw that needs attention brought to it. Don't make my mistake and clear your entire factory to get things moving again then wonder why every fine tuned overclock suddenly feels like its going a lot slower.

item.title: Area Actions Deletes Power Cores
item.dc:creator: @James_Smith James Smith
item.description:
@James_Smith wrote:

I just discovered a major bug with the Area Actions mod that required me to revert back a huge amount of changes. if you use the “clear inventories” action in machines with power cores it will destroy the power cores along with the machines inventory.

I don’t know if its be reported yet but that is a major flaw that needs attention brought to it. Don’t make my mistake and clear your entire factory to get things moving again then wonder why every fine tuned overclock suddenly feels like its going a lot slower.
